ValidationRule.description: If Type is “Publications” and Case Record Type “Tech Pubs” Classification should be CSO Special Programs
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( (Case_Record_Type__c = 'Tech Pubs') && ( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Publications') ) && NOT( ISNULL( TEXT(Classification__c) ) ) && NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Classification__c) ) ) && NOT( ( ISPICKVAL( Classification__c ,'CSO Special Programs') )), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Classification should be 'CSO Special Programs' when Case Record Type is 'Tech Pubs' and Type value is 'Publications'
